sign_in.title: A browser-based Ethereum wallet secured by the Internet Computer and supporting networked-custody
sign_in.description: {OISY_NAME} provides a seamless on-chain experience to manage your Ethereum assets. Using native web technologies and advanced cryptography, {OISY_NAME} eliminates the need for browser extensions or mobile apps.

menu.alt: Your wallet address, settings, sign-out and external links

wallet.icp_deposits: Note: For ICP deposits, use the 'Receive' button in your ICP account to get the right address.

hero.use_with_caution: Learn more about this alpha version. Use with caution.
hero.learn_more_about_erc20_icp: Learn more about ERC20 ICP on Ethereum.

settings.title: Settings
settings.principal_description: Your ID for the {OISY_NAME}. Created by your Internet Identity.
settings.session_description: All sessions last 1 hour. After 1 hour, you will need to authenticate again with Internet Identity.
settings.testnets_description: Display the test networks (Sepolia) and twin tokens on testnets (ckTESTBTC and ckSepolia).
settings.testnets_toggle: Toggle to show or hide testnets
settings.tokens_description: The list of tokens currently supported by your {OISY_NAME}.
